  • Method Details

    • createSeperator

      public static void createSeperator(int length)
      Creates a separator line of a specified length and prints it to the console.
      Parameters:
      length - the length of the separator line

    • createTableSeperator

      public static void createTableSeperator(int[] stringWidths)
      Creates a table separator line based on the widths of the columns and prints it to the console. The separator line starts and ends with a '+' character.
      Parameters:
      stringWidths - an array of integers representing the widths of the columns

    • isValidMenuChoice

      public static boolean isValidMenuChoice(int choice, int size)
      Validates if the given menu choice is within the valid range.
      Parameters:
      choice - the menu choice to validate
      size - the number of menu options
      Returns:
      true if the choice is valid, false otherwise

    • createMenu

      public static void createMenu(String name, List<String> actions)
      Creates and prints a menu with the given name and actions.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the menu
      actions - the actions to be included in the menu

    • formatTimeSlot

      public static String formatTimeSlot(TimeSlot slot)
      Formats a time slot into a string representation. The format is "hh:mm a - hh:mm a". Example: "09:30 AM - 11:00 AM"
      Parameters:
      slot - the time slot to format
      Returns:
      the formatted time slot string

    • centerAlign

      public static String centerAlign(String text, int width)
      Centers a given text within a specified width. If the text length is greater than or equal to the width, the text is returned as is.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to center align
      width - the width to center the text within
      Returns:
      the centered text

    • getMaxScheduleWidth

      public static int getMaxScheduleWidth(Instructor instructor)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the schedule of an instructor. The width is based on the number of time slots for the courses assigned to the instructor.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the instructor whose schedule width is to be calculated
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the schedule

    • getMaxTimeSlotWidth

      public static int getMaxTimeSlotWidth(List<Course> courses)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the time slots of a list of courses.
      Parameters:
      courses - the list of courses
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the time slots

    • getMaxEnrolledStudentNameWidth

      public static int getMaxEnrolledStudentNameWidth(CourseSection section)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the names of students enrolled in a course section.
      Parameters:
      section - the course section whose enrolled students' names are to be considered
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the names of enrolled students

    • getMaxEnrolledStudentEmailWidth

      public static int getMaxEnrolledStudentEmailWidth(CourseSection section)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the email addresses of students enrolled in a course section.
      Parameters:
      section - the course section whose enrolled students' email addresses are to be considered
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the email addresses of enrolled students

    • getMaxUserNameWidth

      public static int getMaxUserNameWidth(AccountManager manager)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the names of users managed by the account manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the account manager
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the names of users

    • getMaxUserEmailWidth

      public static int getMaxUserEmailWidth(AccountManager manager)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the email addresses of users managed by the account manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the account manager
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the email addresses of users

    • getMaxUserPasswordWidth

      public static int getMaxUserPasswordWidth(AccountManager manager)
      Calculates the maximum width required to display the passwords of users managed by the account manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the account manager
      Returns:
      the maximum width required to display the passwords of users

    • yesNoToBoolean

      public static boolean yesNoToBoolean(String input)
      Converts a yes/no input string to a boolean value.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string ("y" for yes, "n" for no)
      Returns:
      true if the input is "y", false otherwise
